name: Black Ink Technologies
description: Black Ink, a business unit of Winsper, provides marketing analytics and Enterprise Marketing ROI SaaS offerings to a range of organizations.  Category experience includes Consumer Durable Goods, Technology, Finance and non-profit.  We are experts at master data management and developing complex analytical model development and analysis.  Our Eye On ROI SaaS offering helps both finance and marketing leaders measuring, monitoring and optimizing marketing ROI.
